# crosswire Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "crosswire" {
  host      = "https://different.crosswire.endpoint"
  api_token = "INSERT-API-TOKEN-HERE"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_token` (String, Sensitive) API token for your Crosswire organization
- `host` (String)
